overview: Sandes was one of the most important hotels of the period, located in Doğanbey, Izmir region. This hotel, which was closed at the end of the 90's, is a ghost hotel that has not been operating since then. Bülent and Tezcan(director's parents), both of which were the hotel's employees, met in this hotel on 1996 and decided to get married. Bülent and Tezcan visit this ghost hotel after 25 years.
tagline: Do places have memories? If they have, is an aged place face act of forgetting just like people?
title: Sandes
